text: Can’t remember the iOS but it’s a Iphone SE device. In the end I decided to changing it to grid, with the auto-fit property. I gave a try to use a fallback with margins but it didn’t work either, so Grid :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi !
Is there French ppl here ?

Hi Rémi, yes I believe there are French folks in here. The developers in this slack are all over the world. I think North America and Europe are where the majority of folks are from in here. So you may see that activity in here is higher during work hours for those regions
Any way to create a community message board using HubSpot? Kind of like <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com> ?
